name: Multi- Colored Grey Cowl Infinity Scarf
description: This cowl scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. It's functional and fashionable. Any way you wear it - - it will quickly become your favorite.

name: Grey Infinity Scarf
description: This grey infinity scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. It's functional and fashionable. Any way you wear it - - it will quickly become your favorite.

description: This taupe scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. It's functional and fashionable. Any way you wear it - - it will quickly become your favorite.

name: Open-Weave Black Leg Warmers / Boot Socks
description:
'Tis the season ladies. We have the perfect addition to your winter
wardrobe. These lacey leg warmers will make you
swoon. They are essential to any fall and winter ensemble. Whether you
are dressing up or dressing down, you can do it in comfort and style
with these leg warmers.

Buy them, wear them, LOVE them!

name: Soft Grey Fur and Cable-Knit Infinity Scarf
description: Dress up or dress down this fur cowl scarf with cable-knit underbelly. It is cozy and comfortable with soft fur on one side and grey cable-knit on the other. Show all fur or fur accents depending on your mood.

name: Chunky Blue Multi-Colored Knit Scarf
description: This scarf was made from chunky blue and multi- colored yarn with flecks of sequins sparkled throughout. It is oh-so-soft and cozy. Also available in: White

name: Chunky Multi-Colored Infinity Scarf
description: This scarf was made from chunky white and multi-colored yarn with flecks of sequins sparkled throughout. It is oh-so-soft and cozy. Also available in: Cobalt Blue

name: Cream Patterened Knit Infinity Scarf
description: This patterned knit scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. It's functional and fashionable. Any way you wear it - - it will quickly become your favorite. Also available in: Black

name: Black Patterened Knit Infinity Scarf
description: This cable-knit scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. It's functional and fashionable. Any way you wear it - - it will quickly become your favorite. Also available in: Cream

name: Chunky Soft Knitted Infinity Scarf Beige
description: This super soft open weave scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. The wide stitches make the scarf soft, light, and cozy. Also available in: Black

name: Chunky Soft Knitted Infinity Scarf Black
description: This super soft open weave scarf is a must-have with your fall and winter wardrobe. The wide stitches make the scarf soft, light, and cozy. Also available in: Beige

name: Combo Pack- Tiered Ruffle Slip Extender
description: Buy 2 and SAVE on shipping. With this combo pack you will receive 2 slips of our most popular style, any color of your choosing. We offer black, brown, ivory, purple, white, turquoise, and bright pink. (See separate listing for color pictures.) Make note of color choices in the notes section at checkout (if no notes, we will send black and cream, our most popular colors). You will pay just one shipping charge and receive the sale price on both slips! *This style can be extended to longer lengths if requested.

name: Black Ruffled Lace Extender Slip
description:
4" black ruffled lace trimmed skirt extender slip.


Total length for standard slips is 24"-25", petite length measures 21".

Please include any special requests in the notes section at checkout.

name: Black Tiered Ruffle Extender Slip
description:
5 1/2 inch polyester blend trimmed skirt extender slip has slight stretch and is a great choice for versatility dressing up or dressing down. Trim includes 5 rows of approximately 1 inch ruffles. Also available in:
  • Purple

  • Brown
  • Navy
  • Bright Pink
  • White
  • Turquoise
